name: sookie
notes:
wrap yourself in warmth and charm with the **sookie crochet cardigan**, a playful and practical piece inspired by the beloved characterâ€™s quirky style. this cardigan is designed for all-day comfort, featuring soft, color-changing yarn and a stitch pattern that adds just the right amount of texture. and yes, it has pockets! 

as part of the [6th annual turkey trot make-along][1], hosted by marly bird, this crochet cardigan will bring you together with fellow makers from around the globe. starting november 22, you'll work on this project alongside a supportive community with plenty of tutorials and tips to guide you through. the **sookie cardigan** is all about embracing the season with creativity and cozy style.

skill level: confident beginner

sizes: available in multiple sizes, with detailed instructions for the perfect fit.

features:

relaxed, comfy fit with pockets for a touch of practicality
rich color transitions that showcase the beautiful autumn palette
textured stitch pattern for added depth and personality

get the pattern: [available free on marlybird.com][2] with grow subscription, or go [vip to get the ad-free pdf][3], exclusive stitch diagrams, bonus patterns, and more!


  [1]: https://marlybird.com/blog/turkey-trot-2024/
  [2]: https://marlybird.com/blog/turkey-trot-2024/
